sys_ux_client_script.name: Navigate to Order creation page

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_336dd2724706b110036bbce5536d4351
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default copy">a76d9a324706b110036bbce5536d4357</macroponent><name>Navigate to Order creation page</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        emit
    } = api;
    //Redirect Payload
    const customPayload = {
        'route': 'order-capture',
        'fields': {
            'sysId': '-1',
            'category': api.state.category,
            'type': api.state.orderType
        },
        'redirect': null,
        'passiveNavigation': null,
        'title': null,
        'multiInstField': 'sysId',
        'targetRoute': (typeof api.context.props.account !== 'undefined' && api.context.props.account !== '') ? 'current' : null,
        'external': null
    };

    if (typeof api.context.props.account !== 'undefined' && api.context.props.account !== '') {
        customPayload.params = {
            account: api.context.props.account
        };
    }

    emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', customPayload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-26 18:53:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>336dd2724706b110036bbce5536d4351</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Navigate to Order creation page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace" source="x_876519_att_work">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AT&amp;T Workspace">e90c1d2e47c63110036bbce5536d43e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_336dd2724706b110036bbce5536d4351</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-27 20:52:04</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
